title: Understanding TypeScript
body: TypeScript is a powerful tool for writing robust JavaScript code. It introduces types to JavaScript to improve developer productivity and code quality.

author.name: Alice Johnson
author.bio: Alice is a seasoned web developer with a passion for teaching and sharing knowledge about TypeScript and JavaScript.

title: Advanced CSS Techniques
body: This post explores advanced CSS techniques including Flexbox, Grid, and CSS animations. Learn how to create responsive and visually appealing web designs.

author.name: Bob Smith
author.bio: Bob is a front-end developer who specializes in creating beautiful, responsive designs using modern CSS.

title: Mastering Git and GitHub
body: Git is a version control system, and GitHub is a platform for hosting and collaborating on Git repositories. Learn how to use both tools effectively.

author.name: Dave Wilson
author.bio: Dave is a software engineer with a knack for version control systems and collaboration tools. He loves helping teams streamline their workflows.

title: Building APIs with Node.js
body: Node.js allows you to build scalable network applications using JavaScript. This post covers the fundamentals of building APIs with Node.js and Express.

author.name: Eve Brown
author.bio: Eve is a backend developer with a focus on building high-performance APIs and microservices using Node.js and other modern technologies.
